  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the get_token endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Get detailed token information","properties":{"asset_id":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Asset ID of the token (null for XCH)"}},"title":"GetToken"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_token","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with token details","properties":{"token":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"type":"object","required":["precision","visible","balance"],"properties":{"asset_id":{"type":["string","null"]},"balance":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0}],"title":"Amount"},"description":{"type":["string","null"]},"icon_url":{"type":["string","null"]},"name":{"type":["string","null"]},"precision":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","minimum":0},"revocation_address":{"type":["string","null"]},"ticker":{"type":["string","null"]},"visible":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"TokenRecord","description":"Token information if found"}]}},"title":"GetTokenResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
